details: This course covers the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, loops, and basic algorithms. It is suitable for beginners and provides a solid foundation for further studies in computer science.
This course introduces key concepts in algorithms, algorithm design, and analysis. It is designed for individuals interested in mastering algorithmic problem-solving.
Learn C++ programming and data structures for competitive programming and data structure and algorithms (DSA) preparation.
This course provides an introduction to fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Essential for any programmer.
Explore Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts using Python. Learn to create classes, objects, and implement inheritance and polymorphism.
Master the principles of software engineering, including software development methodologies, design patterns, and project management.
Learn about Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. Discover how to deploy and manage applications in the cloud.
Get hands-on experience with MySQL, one of the world's most popular relational database management systems (RDBMS).
Enhance your problem-solving skills by tackling a variety of challenging problems in this practical course.
